publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3349 Mr Andy Kerr: Public Appointments and Public Bodies etc. (Scotland) Bill: Financial Resolution-That the Parliament, for the purposes of any Act of the Scottish Parliament resulting from the Public Appointments and Public Bodies etc. (Scotland) Bill, agrees to any increase in the sums payable out of the Scottish Consolidated Fund in consequence of the Act. Supported by: Peter Peacock*

S1M-3349 Mr Andy Kerr: Public Appointments and Public Bodies etc. (Scotland) Bill: Financial Resolution-That the Parliament, for the purposes of any Act of the Scottish Parliament resulting from the Public Appointments and Public Bodies etc. (Scotland) Bill, agrees to any increase in the sums payable out of the Scottish Consolidated Fund in consequence of the Act. Supported by: Peter Peacock

Supported by: Peter Peacock
